thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text:
Website is great. It helped me find a new place to live fairly quickly.
Put in the preferences and I just kept getting emails suggesting places. And the suggestions were good. Close to what I was after.
The community aspect of the website is good also. Had been contacted regularly by people looking for an extra room mate. I like that the reaching out goes both ways. Greater chances for success.
